property.name: styleSheet
property.description: Type "C". Stylesheet to use for generated excel spreadsheet.

property.name: Column
property.description: Type "Array of ReportExcelColumn". Column definitions for generated excel spreadsheet.

property.name: Band
property.description: Type "Array of ReportExcelBand". Band definitions for generated excel spreadsheet.

property.name: DisplayGridLines
property.description: Type "L". Turn on show for grid lines.

property.name: repeatRowCount
property.description: Type "N". Number of rows to lock at the top of the generated excel spreadsheet.

property.name: repeatColumnStart
property.description: Type "N". Which column to start repeat in generated Excel spreadsheet.

property.name: repeatColumnCount
property.description: Type "N". How many columns to repeat in generated excel spreadsheet.

methodref.name: ColumnsWidth
methodref.description: Returns the cumulative width of the columns.

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Populate entire report excel template (stylesheet/bands/columns) from a single definition string.

methodref.name: MoveBand
methodref.description: Move a block of Band items.

methodref.name: MoveColumn
methodref.description: Move a block of Column items.

methodref.name: PageFromString
methodref.description: Populate page properties from a string.

methodref.name: ToString
methodref.description: Output representation of report excel template to a single definition string.

methodref.name: Clone
methodref.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.

page.original:
Reporting::ReportExcelTemplate Class Properties Property Type Description styleSheet C Stylesheet to use for generated excel spreadsheet. Column Array of ReportExcelColumn Column definitions for generated excel spreadsheet. Band Array of ReportExcelBand Band definitions for generated excel spreadsheet. DisplayGridLines L Turn on show for grid lines repeatRowStart N Offset for first row repeatRowCount N Number of rows to lock at the top of the generated excel spreadsheet. repeatColumnStart N Which column to start repeat in generated Excel spreadsheet. repeatColumnCount N How many columns to repeat in generated excel spreadsheet.
Methods Method Description PUBLIC AddColumn AS L (as Reporting::ReportExcelColumn AS Column)Add a Column. PUBLIC Clone AS P ()Create a copy of an object instance. PUBLIC ColumnsFromString AS v (columns AS C)Populate columns from a string. PUBLIC ColumnsToString AS c ()Dump columns to string. PUBLIC ColumnsWidth AS n (column AS N ,N count AS )Returns the cumulative width of the columns. PUBLIC DeleteBand AS L (as N AS Index)Delete a Band. PUBLIC DeleteColumn AS L (as N AS Index)Delete a Column. PUBLIC FromString AS v (definition AS C)Populate entire report excel template (stylesheet/bands/columns) from a single definition string. PUBLIC InsertBand AS L (as Reporting::ReportExcelBand [ AS Band ,InsertBefore as N = 1] AS )Insert a new Band. PUBLIC InsertColumn AS L (as Reporting::ReportExcelColumn [ AS Column ,InsertBefore as N = 1] AS )Insert a new Column. PUBLIC MoveBand AS L (as N AS MoveTo ,MoveFrom as N [ItemsToCopy as N = 1] AS )Move a block of Band items. PUBLIC MoveColumn AS L (as N AS MoveTo ,MoveFrom as N [ItemsToCopy as N = 1] AS )Move a block of Column items. PUBLIC NewInstance AS P ()Create a new object instance of the same type. PUBLIC PageFromString AS v (page AS C)Populate page properties from a string. PUBLIC PageToString AS c ()Dump page to string. PUBLIC ToString AS c ()Output representation of report excel template to a single definition string.
See Also Reporting Namespace
